mapper.sql: SELECT t.user_id, t.staff_number, t.staff_name, t.document_type, (SELECT li.`name` FROM t_sys_lookup l,t_sys_lookup_item li WHERE l.`code` = li.parent_code and l.`code` = '${@com.everwing.coreservice.common.wy.common.enums.LookupEnum@documentType.name()}' AND li.`code` = t.document_type) as document_type_name, t.document_number, t.image, t.mobile_telephone, t.join_date, t.login_name, t.company_id, t.sex, (SELECT li.`name` FROM t_sys_lookup l,t_sys_lookup_item li WHERE l.`code` = li.parent_code and l.`code` = '${@com.everwing.coreservice.common.wy.common.enums.LookupEnum@sex.name()}' AND li.`code` = t.sex) as sex_name, t.type, t.status, (SELECT li.`name` FROM t_sys_lookup l,t_sys_lookup_item li WHERE l.`code` = li.parent_code and l.`code` = '${@com.everwing.coreservice.common.wy.common.enums.LookupEnum@enableDisable.name()}' AND li.`code` = t.status) as status_name, t.staff_state, (SELECT li.`name` FROM t_sys_lookup l,t_sys_lookup_item li WHERE l.`code` = li.parent_code and l.`code` = '${@com.everwing.coreservice.common.wy.common.enums.LookupEnum@staffState.name()}' AND li.`code` = t.staff_state) as staff_state_name, t.creater_id, t.creater_name, t.create_time, t.modify_id, t.modify_name, t.modify_time FROM t_sys_user t WHERE 1=1
mapper.select: AND user_id = #{userId} AND staff_number = #{staffNumber} AND login_name = #{loginName} AND password = #{password} AND type = #{type} AND staff_state = #{staffState} ORDER BY login_name ASC
